boardgame.name: Gùgōng
boardgame.description: China, 1570. China is under the reign of the Longqing Emperor, of the Ming Dynasty. He inherited a country in disarray after years of mismanagement and corruption. He resided in the Forbidden city, which was the seat of many emperors under the Ming Dynasty. Constructed from 1406 to 1420, the complex consists of 980 buildings and covers 72 ha (over 180 acres). It is also under the Ming Dynasty that the Great Wall of China was rebuilt, fortified, and expanded. Around this period, China was under heavy attack from the Mongols, so maintaining the Great Wall was essential. Most of what we now have left of the Great Wall, we owe to the Ming dynasty._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The country was already famous for its very intricate bureaucracy, but this also led to a lot of corruption. Even though the penalties for corruption were very high, the highest Officials of the Forbidden City would pretend to uphold the ban on corruption, by accepting gifts of petitioners, and returning one of seemingly lower value._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;G_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ugrave;gōng uses this extraordinary custom as its basis. Players take on the role of powerful Chinese families trying to gain influence and power by exchanging gifts with Officials. The gift cards you offer as a player have to be of a higher value than the one you receive, forcing you to make strategic choices regarding which actions you want to take each turn. You will travel around China, sail down the Grand Canal, purchase precious jade, help construct the Great Wall, secure advantages through decrees, influence the game through intrigue, and ultimately, receive an audience with the emperor. If only 1 player succeeds in doing so, he wins. If several players succeed, the player with the most VPs among those players wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(Espa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;ol)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;China, 1570. El pa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;s est_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; bajo el reinado del Emperador Longqing, de la Dinast_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a Ming. Su padre, el Emperador Jiajing, rein_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute; durante muchos a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;os. A pesar de ser un hombre diligente, era tambi_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;n conocido por su crueldad y por la preocupaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n de sus propios intereses frente a los del pa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;s. Aquellos que se opon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;an a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;l normalmente no sobreviv_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;an mucho tiempo. Su largo reinado marc_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute; el comienzo de un per_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;odo de cierta estabilidad, pero sus excentricidades dejaron al pa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;s en un estado realmente pobre, da_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;ado por la incesante corrupci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Los jugadores asumen el papel de poderosas familias chinas que tratar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n de ganar influencia y poder sobornando a los funcionarios responsables de ciertas tareas, intercambiando los regalos adecuados, en el transcurso de 4 d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;as. Los jugadores obtendr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n puntos de victoria de esta manera, y aquel con mayor n_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uacute;mero de puntos de victoria ganar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; el juego. Pero cuidado: sobre todo debes tratar de conseguir una audiencia con el propio Emperador. Si no lo consigues, todos tus esfuerzos habr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n sido en vano._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;descripci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n de la Editorial_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Yet again, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve developed buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s remorse about a Kickstarter pledge. Please add a flat $10 for shipping costs! This game is the Deluxe edition and will be shipped with all stretch goals direct from the publisher as soon as the campaign is fulfilled. English language. Because PayPal buyer protection does no cover preorders, please choose a feeless payment method. PayPal Pay For Goods will be a waste of money. If you have any questions, please ask!

FREE SHIPPING! This is not for the game! This is for a set of 20 EMERALD cut shape Top Grade Zambian Natural Green Emerald loose gems to replace the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;jade_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; glass beads in the game. These exact same beautiful stones can be purchased on eBay for $17 but they ship from India and take around a month to receive. Because these are loose gems the size varies SLIGHTLY from stone to stone. I have included a picture with a top view and a picture with a bottom view of the stones with a penny for size reference. They are really beautiful in person and I think they will make a huge upgrade to the game. I only have one set for sale so get it while you can. Shipping is $3 bubble wrapped.
